item.title: ðŸ˜Š [PRO-GOV] Uncle Ramesh: When Comedy Becomes Propaganda
item.description: Uncle Ramesh responds to today’s Daily Laugh and explains why some people confuse progress with problems. Plus: why comedy should punch up, not sideways.
